metadata.Title: CVE-2021-26318 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: A timing and power-based side channel attack leveraging the x86 PREFETCH instructions on some AMD CPUs could potentially result in leaked kernel address space information.

notes.Note: mdeslaur> no details on microcode update as of 2022-01-05

criterions.comment: amd64-microcode: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
